pkgmetadata.longdescription: Marine Regions Data from 'Marineregions.org' // Tools to get marine regions data from http:// www.marineregions.org/. Includes tools to get region metadata, as well as data in 'GeoJSON' format, as well as Shape files. Use cases include using data downstream to visualize 'geospatial' data by marine region, mapping variation among different regions, and more.
